description: Weeping Japanese Hackberry (Celtis sinensis 'Green Cascade') is an amazing ornamental tree that makes a stunning statement in the landscape. It has a beautiful cascading form with arching branches that are covered in delicate, heart-shaped bright green leaves. In the springtime it produces clusters of small, white flowers. In the fall, the green foliage turns a rich yellow-gold color. It is a fast growing tree and can reach heights of 30-40 feet in just a few years and its foliage can spread to over 8 feet wide. It is low maintenance and drought tolerant. This tree is ideal for growing in containers or as a feature tree for windbreaks, screens, and privacy hedges. Its unique and beautiful cascading form makes it a great choice in any landscape.
